snippet.title: Avas' Hidden Adventures Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Avas' Hidden Adventures is a hand-drawn hidden object adventure game. Go on some adventures with Ava as she enters her drawings and explores fantastical worlds.

Avas' Hidden Adventures is coming soon for PC.
